MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G78 postcode area of Glasgow. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:15am due to a fault on our underground cable network located outside 16 Kerr Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:48am on Friday, 02 April 2021
